snippet: The Association of American Railroads said on Thursday that major railroads delivered 434,042 carloads of crude oil in 2013, an increase of 83 percent from 2012.
abstract: Association of American Railroads reports that major railroads delivered 434,042 carloads of crude oil in 2013, an increase of 83 percent from 2012.
lead_paragraph: The Association of American Railroads said on Thursday that major railroads delivered 434,042 carloads of crude oil in 2013, an increase of 83 percent from 2012.

headline.main: Crude Oil Shipments by Rail Increased 83 Percent in 2013
headline.print_headline: Crude Oil Shipments by Rail Increased 83 Percent in 2013
